title: AWS Educate Getting Started with Cloud Ops
description: Completed Cloud Operations training and passed the post-course assessment.

title: AWS Educate Getting Started with Compute
description: Completed Compute services training with required assessment scores.

title: AWS Educate Getting Started with Databases
description: Completed Databases training and passed the assessment.

title: AWS Educate Getting Started with Networking
description: Learned core networking concepts and AWS networking services.

title: AWS Educate Getting Started with Security
description: Gained foundational knowledge of AWS security services.

title: AWS Educate Getting Started with Serverless
description: Earners of this badge have completed the Getting Started with Serverless training and achieved the required scores on the post-course assessment.

title: AWS Educate Getting Started with Storage
description: Earners of this badge have completed the Getting Started with Storage training and achieved the required scores on the post-course assessment.

title: AWS Educate Introduction to Cloud 101
description: Earners of this badge have completed the Cloud Computing 101 training and achieved the required scores on the post-course assessment.

title: Docker Essentials: A Developer Introduction
description: The individual knows how to run containers from Docker Hub, create Docker containers, and how to solve basic problems of orchestration (reconciliation, scaling, high availability, service discovery).

title: Legacy Responsive Web Design V8
description: Completed FreeCodeCamp’s Legacy Responsive Web Design V8, learning HTML, CSS, Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design to build mobile-friendly web pages.

title: Front End Development Libraries V8
description: Completed FreeCodeCamp’s Front End Development Libraries V8, gaining skills in React, Redux, Bootstrap, jQuery, and Sass to build dynamic, responsive web applications.

title: Data Visualization V8
description: Completed FreeCodeCamp’s Data Visualization V8, learning to create interactive charts and graphs using D3.js, Chart.js, and other visualization libraries to effectively present data.

title: Relational Database V8
description: Completed FreeCodeCamp’s Relational Databases V8, gaining practical experience with SQL, PostgreSQL, and data modeling to design, query, and manage relational databases effectively.

title: Back End Development and APIs V8
description: Completed FreeCodeCamp’s Relational Databases V8, gaining practical experience with SQL, PostgreSQL, and data modeling to design, query, and manage relational databases effectively.

title: Web Design for Beginners
description: Completed the Web Design for Beginners course from CODL, University of Moratuwa, learning fundamental HTML, CSS, and responsive design techniques to create structured and visually appealing web pages.

title: Front End Development
description: Completed the Frontend Development course from CODL, University of Moratuwa, gaining hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend techniques to build responsive and interactive web interfaces.

title: InnovMind
description: Successfully completed the workshop on IOT organized by the IEEE Industry Application Society of SLTC.

title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
description: Completed the Introduction to Cloud Computing course by SkillUp (Simplilearn), learning cloud fundamentals, service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS), deployment models, and key concepts for modern cloud-based solutions.

title: Introduction to HTML
description: Completed an Introduction to HTML course, learning the fundamentals of HTML5, including structuring web content, semantic tags, forms, links, and basic page layout.

title: Azure Fundamentals
description: Completed the Azure Fundamentals course, learning core concepts of Microsoft Azure, including cloud services, storage, networking, security, and basic deployment of cloud solutions.

title: Microsoft Azure Cloud Streak 3.0
description: Attendance and completion of the Microsoft Student ambassador's azure cloud streak 3.0
